Package com.twiddles.ganesha.functionality

Provides classes and interfaces for loading, editing and writing RDF/XML data.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
RDFAlt Interface for querying and modifying RDF Alt containers.
RDFBag Interface for querying and modifying an RDF bag.
RDFContainer Interface for querying and modifying RDF containers.
RDFFile Interface for accessing, modifying and creating data in an RDF/XML file.
RDFObject Interface for querying the object of an RDF resource's property.
RDFPredicate Interface for querying the predicate of an RDF resource's property.
RDFProperty Interface for querying and modifying properties of an RDF resource.
RDFResource Interface for querying and modifying RDF resources.
RDFSeq Interface for querying and modifying an RDF sequence.
 

Class Summary
JenaAlt Implementation of RDFAlt using Jena.
JenaBag Implementation of RDFBag using Jena.
JenaContainerAdaptor Adaptor class for the Jena implementations of the RDF Containers.
JenaFile Implementation of RDFFile using Jena.
JenaObject Implementation of RDFObject using Jena.
JenaPredicate Implementation of RDFPredicate using Jena.
JenaProperty Implementation of RDFProperty using Jena.
JenaResource Implementation of RDFResource using Jena.
JenaSeq Implementation of RDFSeq using Jena.
 

Exception Summary
RdfIOException An exception during input or output of RDF/XML data.
 

Package com.twiddles.ganesha.functionality Description

Provides classes and interfaces for loading, editing and writing RDF/XML data. These classes represent the internals of Ganesha that do the actual work on the RDF data.

The GUI frontend interacts with RDF data via the interfaces provided in this package. This allows for changes in the implementation of how RDF data is worked on which are completely independent of the GUI code.

The current implementation uses the Jena API for working with RDF/XML data.
